name: The Town That Vanished into Silence
name_original: The Town That Vanished into Silence
description:
The Town That Vanished into Silence is a text-based mystery game set in a town that one day mysteriously went silent.

You play as a courier who has been tasked to deliver three packages to three inhabitants of this town.

What is there to learn from this town and its inhabitants? Is this town destined to fade into obscurity and is there a solution to remedy this town? I'll guess you'll have to play to find out 【 ͡~ ‿ ͡°】
